OthersCapLevelList.SERVICE_NAME:
SELECT b.TeamName, (Select name from Member where Account = c.Account) as Name , d.CapName,e.LevelName, e.LevelData
From CapOtherEstLevel a, Team b, TeamMember c, CapKind d, CapLevel e
Where a.TeamCode = ?
And a.TeamCode = b.TeamCode
And b.TeamCode = c.TeamCode
And a.Account = c.Account
And a.CapKindCode = d.CapCode
And a.CapLevelCode = e.CapLevelCode

TeamMemberList.SERVICE_NAME:
SELECT a.TeamName, a.TeamCode, b.Account , (Select name from Member where Account = b.Account ) As Name
From Team a left outer join TeamMember b on a.TeamCode = b.TeamCode
Where a.TeamCode = ?
